description: Environment and Climate Change Canada has a requirement for Temporary Help Services and has issued a Request for Proposal to suppliers generated from CPSS who are qualified under the streams and categories listed above.
full_summary:
=====================

### Title
Informatics Professional Services for Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC)
=============================================================

### Reference and Solicitation Information
---------------------------------------------

*   Reference Number: cb-419-42253018
*   Solicitation Number: 5000077878
*   Amendment Number: 4
*   Amendment Date: 2024-01-19

### Tender Information
----------------------

*   **Request for Proposal:** Temporary Help Services Requirement
*   **Estimated Contract Period:** February 1, 2024 to January 2, 2025
*   **Location:** National Capital Region (NCR), Canada
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering
*   **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

### Security Requirements
------------------------

*   The resources required for this contract must have a minimum security level of Reliability.

### Services Description
-----------------------

The temporary help services requirement of Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) is for Informatics Professional Services. This requirement is only open to suppliers who have qualified under the streams and categories listed below:

*   Stream: 5
*   Stream: 5.1
*   Category: Computer
*   Category: Application Support
*   Category: Senior

Suppliers are required to provide resources with specialized skills in these areas.

### Contract Details
--------------------

*   **Duration:** 12 months
*   **Expected Number of Resources:** 4
*   **Estimated Level of Effort:** 180 days

### Contact Information
----------------------

*   **Name:** Emma Giffin
*   **Email:** <emma.giffin@ec.gc.ca>
*   **Phone:** (999) 000-9999

### Documents
-------------

*   Request for Proposal (RFP) 5000077878

### Attachments
--------------

*   [5000077878_npp_en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29657/5000077878_npp_en.pdf) (English)
*   [5000077878_apm_fr.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29657/5000077878_apm_fr.pdf) (French)

### Cancellation
---------------

This tender has been cancelled. The tender closing date was January 19, 2024, at 15:00:00. The tender status
